### Hotel information

Workshop will be hosted by [Svornost Hotel](https://www.hotelsvornost.cz/en/)

Address: Harrachov 496, 512 46 HARRACHOV, Česká Republika

#### Room options

- 1 participant in a single room
- 1 participant in a double room
- 1 participant in a double room with spouse/partner

You can reserve a room during registration.

[Register](https://forms.gle/242BacUA1v9Jf38h6){.btn .btn-lg .btn-danger role="button"}

### Payment

The workshop registration fee is __€50__ per participant, which is in addition to Svornost Hotel room.

Pay online here or with cash at the workshop. ATMs are available at Svornost Hotel. If you opt for cash, we will provide you with a receipt at the workshop.

[Buy](){.btn .btn-lg .btn-warning role="button"}
